message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe has immense value, potentially exceeding $800000. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product at this time, I'm confident it can be highly beneficial to the right buyer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This is a significant opportunity, and I believe it's a price that reflects the potential value of the product. Please consider this offer carefully. If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay $800000.
